channel.title: Features on Roster Source
channel.description: Recent content in Features on Roster Source

item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Your institution continues to manage your provider data in your existing systems and RosterSource pulls them in automatically. You point us to your data, and we take care of the back-end infrastructure and data exchange.

item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: RosterSource provides free connectivity software, infrastructure, authentication, authorization, and data syncing.

item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Sync your provider data from EHRs, revenue cycle, practice management, or any other system securely.
